data.title: List of Episodes
data.meta_description: A quick, easy-to-read list of all Scooby-Doo episodes from 1969 to the present day.
data.text:
​A quick and easy to read list of all the episodes in the Scooby franchise, numbered by episode chronology. All movies and specials that are not part of any series are spaced out from the regular episodes, and denoted in red.

If you are looking for a full guide of all Scooby episodes with descriptions and airdates, the episode guide lists all this information for each episode.

Scooby-Doo, Where Are You?

(Season 1)

1. What a Night for a Knight

2. Hassle in the Castle

3. A Clue for Scooby-Doo
